name: CollectBerries
bt_task: The robot task is to collect a blackberry from a scrub. The behavior logic of a robot should be as follows. There is a blackberry attached to the scrub, which is located in a garden. A wicker basket is on the floor of the garden, and the robot is also in the garden. The goal is to ensure that the blackberry is collected and placed inside the wicker basket.

Move_to_scrub.description: The robot moves to the location of the scrub.

Detect_blackberry.description: The robot uses its vision sensors to detect the presence of blackberry in the scrub and find where it is specifically.

Move_to_blackberry.description: The robot moves from the current position to the blackberry whose position is known to robot.

Pick_blackberry.description: The robot grasps the blackberry whose position is known to robot, and picks it from the scrub with its grippers.

Move_to_basket.description: The robot moves to the location of the wicker basket.

Deposit_blackberry.description: The robot extends it gripper and deposits blackberry that is in gripper into the wicker basket.

condition_node.robot_is_near_scrub?: Check if the robot is now near the scrub. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.blackberry_is_known?: Check if the robot has known where the blackberry is.
condition_node.robot_is_near_blackberry?: Check if the robot is now near the blackberry. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
condition_node.blackberry_in_gripper?: Check if the blackberry is in the gripper of the robot.
condition_node.robot_is_near_basket?: Check if the robot is now near the wicker basket. Require a distance less than the gripper contact range of the robot to be considered near.
